description: Search VeChain documentation, query on-chain data, and fetch fee suggestions with direct links to relevant pages. Generate wallets and securely sign messages, certificates, and transactions. Accelerate development and operations with streamlined access to VeChain resources.

capabilities.name: get_address
capabilities.description: Get the address of the wallet

capabilities.name: get_chain
capabilities.description: Get the chain of the wallet

capabilities.name: sign_message
capabilities.description: Sign a message with the wallet

capabilities.name: get_balance
capabilities.description: Get the balance of the wallet for native currency or a specific ERC20 token.

capabilities.name: get_token_info_by_ticker
capabilities.description: Get information about a configured token (like contract address and decimals) by its ticker symbol.

capabilities.name: convert_to_base_units
capabilities.description: Convert a token amount from human-readable units to its smallest unit (e.g., wei).

capabilities.name: convert_from_base_units
capabilities.description: Convert a token amount from its smallest unit (e.g., wei) to human-readable units.

capabilities.name: sign_typed_data_evm
capabilities.description: Sign an EIP-712 typed data structure (EVM)

capabilities.name: get_token_allowance_evm
capabilities.description: Get the allowance of an ERC20 token for a spender (returns amount in base units)

capabilities.name: send_token
capabilities.description: Send native currency or an ERC20 token to a recipient, in base units.

capabilities.name: approve_token_evm
capabilities.description: Approve an amount (specified in base units) of an ERC20 token for a spender

capabilities.name: revoke_token_approval_evm
capabilities.description: Revoke approval for an ERC20 token from a spender (sets allowance to 0)

capabilities.name: search_documentation
capabilities.description: Search across the documentation to find relevant information, code examples, API references, and guides. Use this tool when you need to answer questions about VeChain Docs, find specific documentation, understand how features work, or locate implementation details. The search returns contextual content with titles and direct links to the documentation pages.

capabilities.name: get_account
capabilities.description: Get information about a VeChain account/contract by address. Optionally specify a revision (best | justified | finalized | block number | block ID).

capabilities.name: get_transaction
capabilities.description: Get a VeChain transaction by its ID. Optionally include pending txs (meta may be null), return raw hex, or pin to a specific head block.

capabilities.name: get_block
capabilities.description: Retrieve information about a VeChain block by its revision (block ID, number, or keywords: best | justified | finalized).

capabilities.name: get_priority_fee
capabilities.description: Fetch a suggested priority fee for including a transaction in the next blocks from VeChain mainnet.

capabilities.name: create_wallet
capabilities.description: Generate a BIP-39 mnemonic (12/15/18/21/24 words) and derive the account-level secp256k1 key at path m/44'/818'/0'/0 (VET coin type = 818). By default, the private key is REDACTED in the response. Set includeSecret=true to include it (handle with care).

capabilities.name: sign_certificate
capabilities.description: Create and sign a canonical certificate. Includes purpose, payload, domain, timestamp, nonce, and expiresAt.

capabilities.name: sign_raw_transaction
capabilities.description: Decode and sign a raw transaction.
